title: GET_PED_SCRIPT_TASK_COMMAND
content:
0x84FE084// GetPedScriptTaskCommand
Hash GET_PED_SCRIPT_TASK_COMMAND(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: The target ped.Returns: The script task command currently assigned to the ped. A value of 0x811E343C denotes no script task is assigned.Gets the script task command currently assigned to the ped.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for GET_PED_SCRIPT_TASK_COMMAND
GetPedScriptTaskCommand(ped)
